FuncDef: This command displays traffic forward statistics of the specified scope.

ParaDef.Info: Displays information about the name of the IPsec GW up to 32 characters in length.
Displays information about the specified ISA. Values-slot/mda.
Displays information about the specified tunnel group ID. Values-1 to 16.
Displays information about the IP address and port of the peer for dynamic tunneling.
Specifies the name of the static LAN-to-LAN tunnel up to 32 characters in length.
